âœ”ï¸ I remain true to my values â€“ Being authentic, honest, forthright, keeping word, appreciating my freedom, and fighting injustice and inequality. 
âœ”ï¸ I live and work methodical â€“ Plan, prepare and organise every task and action thoroughly, systematically, and efficient.
âœ”ï¸ I maintain oversight with an eye for detail â€“ Being observant, focus on the bigger picture, yet with social and emotional intelligence.
âœ”ï¸ I connect the dots â€“ Being inquisitive and analysing to see and make the connections.
âœ”ï¸ I always keep my cool â€“ Remain calm and collected under all circumstances, see things into perspective and with a touch of humour.

Humanitarian Relief; International Development; Qualitative Research; Water, Sanitation & Hygiene (WASH); Natural Resources Management (NRM); Climate Justice; Advocacy; People, Project and Program Management; Contract Management; Entrepreneurship; Personal Development, Mental Health, Mindfulness and Philosophy, Mentoring, Coaching and Training; Sports: hiking, kayaking, judo, kick boxing and many others.
